name: Don't be crushed
storyline:
Hi! I begin to try myself in Indie game half year ago) And i like it) This is one of my game which I more like) 
 
I hope you will like it too) 
 
Support me please in this deal))
summary:
Its a arcade game with easy gameplay. Its my first game and i ask you to support me please) 
 
You will use touch to pay with owl. Be careful with columns and the ground. 
 
Dowload it from Google Play^
